analytics_file_get.description: Acquire the analytics file as an octet-stream.

analytics_file_clear.description: Remove analytics file and clear analytics log.

live_stream_start.description: Start real-time A/V stream using LTP.

live_stream_stop.description: Stop real-time A/V stream using LTP.

media_list.description: Supports listing of media on SD card.

media_metadata.description: Supports extraction of metadata from a particular media file.
